How did the Middle Colonies differ from New England and the southern

How did people work in the colonies? Why did indentured servitude start,

Why did Jamestown settlers have a high mortality rate? Why did so many

Why did English settlers choose to live on the North Atlantic seaboard?

Who moved to and settled in North America? Why did they choose to live
